question: 何月
sourceMnemonic: You have <kanji>what</kanji> <kanji>month</kanji> - as in: <vocabulary>what month</vocabulary> is it? It's <ja>１０月</ja>, you fool. Get a job, hippy.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji, but <ja>何</ja> actually uses the kun'yomi reading here! And since <ja>月</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember this reading:

<vocabulary>What month</vocabulary> gives you <reading>naan</reading> <reading>guts</reading> (<ja>なんがつ</ja>)? It's the month you eat so much naan that even your guts turn into naan! But <vocabulary>which month</vocabulary> was it again?
